site_name: Development Site At Former Whiteleys Centre
description: Amendments to planning permission dated 17th December 2019 (RN: 19/02449/FULL) for demolition of and redevelopment of building behind retained and refurbished facades to Queensway and Porchester Gardens facades to provide a mixed use development comprising three basement levels, ground floor and up to 10 upper floor levels, containing residential units (Class C3), retail floorspace (Class A1 and A3) facing Queensway and arranged around a new retail arcade below re-provided central atrium and central retail courtyard, public car park, hotel (Class C1), cinema (Class D2) gym (Class D2), cr√®che (Class D1), with associated landscaping and public realm improvements, provision of basement residential parking spaces, cycle parking and associated basement level plant and servicing provision.  (Linked to 19/02374/LBC) NAMELY, to amend the wording of condition 35 so that the BREEAM Excellent requirement relates only to the non-residential element of the development.
